name: Final Tennis
overview: The Davis Cup has just begun and many of you will have followed the exploits of our tennis players and even the world super-champions excitedly (unfortunately, we are a little behind in the standings). To make up and show the world what we are capable of, here is Final Tennis\Match Ball, a game in which you will have to show how good you are at tennis. The rules are naturally known to everyone, so it will not be difficult for you to follow the them. At the beginning, you choose the number of players, which team uses which color shirts and way you go. Have fun, champions! Published in Game On 1989/12 and in Italy in Special Program n.63 (marzo 1990).
